info.name: ENS Implementation and Compliance
info.main: Test your knowledge of the implementation process and compliance requirements of the National Security Scheme (ENS) in Spain
info.results: Congratulations! You now have a solid understanding of ENS implementation and compliance processes as per Spanish regulations.

questions.q: What is the main objective of the National Security Scheme (ENS)?

a.option: To ensure the security of information systems used by public administrations
To provide cybersecurity training to government employees

questions.q: What are the three security levels established by ENS?
What is the validity period of an ENS certification?
Which organization supervises compliance with ENS in Spain?
What is the first step in implementing ENS?
What does the Organizational Framework of ENS include?
What is the purpose of the Statement of Applicability in ENS?

a.option: To prepare a statement of applicable security measures
To list all employees in the organization
To document the organization's financial status
To outline the organization's marketing strategy

questions.q: What is a key difference between ENS and ISO 27001?

a.option: ENS is mandatory for Spanish public administrations, while ISO 27001 is voluntary
ENS is international, while ISO 27001 is specific to Spain
ENS focuses on private sector, while ISO 27001 is for public sector
ENS is free to implement, while ISO 27001 requires payment

questions.q: What does the Operational Framework in ENS cover?

a.option: Measures to protect the operation of the system as an integral set of components

questions.q: What is the purpose of capacity management in ENS?

a.option: To ensure systems can handle current and future workloads

questions.q: What is the role of the Security Officer in ENS implementation?

a.option: To oversee the implementation and operation of security measures
To perform all security-related tasks personally

questions.q: What is the purpose of periodic reassessment in ENS?

a.option: To review and update security controls to ensure they remain effective
To reevaluate the organization's market position
To recalculate the organization's financial status

questions.q: What does the principle of differentiated function in ENS refer to?

a.option: Differentiating between those responsible for information, service, and security
Differentiating between different types of data

questions.q: What is the main focus of the 'protection measures' category in ENS?

a.option: Implementing specific security controls to protect information and systems
Protecting the organization from financial risks

questions.q: What is the purpose of incident management in ENS?

a.option: To effectively respond to and mitigate the impact of security incidents
